item.title: Analysis of Landlord and Tenant Bill (2018) Uganda
item.description: PART 2 – TENANCY AGREEMENTS Despite the freedom regarding the form of contract in subsection 3(1), we strongly discourage the option of a verbal contract. It is beneficial that both parties opt for terms ingrained in a deed to eliminate the unnecessary burden that arises from verbal contracts. Why fight the avoidable battle to prove the existence of a contract before the real battles like disputing the contract’s precise meaning or its inadequacy.
